*_1. Click on "Force.com Platform", and select "AppExchange" option._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install1.JPG

*_2. On the "Finds Apps" section, write "Projectforce" and press the Enter key. _*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install2.jpg

*_3. Click on "ProjectForce Beta" link._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install3.jpg

*_4. Click on "Get It Now"._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install4.jpg

*_5. Choose "Production" option, and click on "OK" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install5.jpg

*_6. Enter your UserName, Password and click on "Login" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install6.jpg

*_7. Check "I have read and agree..." option._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step1.jpg

*_8. Click on "Install" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step2.jpg

*_9. Enter your password, and click on "Submit" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step3.jpg

*_10. Click on "Continue" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step3.jpg

*_11. Click on "Next" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step3.jpg

*_12. Select "Grant Access to all Users" option, and click on "Next" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step4.jpg

*_13. Check "Ignore Apex test..." and click on "Install" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step5.jpg

*_14. Click on "Deploy"_*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step6.jpg

*_15. Click on "Create"_*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step7.JPG

*_16. Click on "Objects"_*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step8.JPG

*_17. Click on "Discussion"_*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step9.jpg

*_18. Scroll down the page_*

*_19. Click on the "Override" link which is next to "Discussions Tab"_*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/step10.jpg
